import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Recipe } from '../recipe.model' @Component({ selector: 'app-recipe-list', templateUrl: './recipe-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./recipe-list.component.css'] }) export class RecipeListComponent { recipes: Recipe[] = [ new Recipe('A Test Recipe', 'A Description of the Test Recipe', 'https://img.freepik.com/free-psd/restaurant-vintage-badge-template-psd-set-remixed-from-public-domain-artworks_53876-141767.jpg?w=740&t=st=1675393339~exp=1675393939~hmac=1187a537ad4c56c4cca6d28b2954d7834f85d0b20a243e5e7ef69b60d7b9cfbe')]; }

{{ recipe.name }}

{{ recipe.description }}
